name: Fighting Club 2018
description:
Use your punching and kicking abilities in Fighting Club 2018 game. Make your own fighting gang and use your combo as super hero street buddy fighting champ. Face ultimate fighting champions in this Fighting Club 2018 game. Boxing, karate and super kung fu fighting is main theme of the free Fighting Club 2018. Let’s start street brawl and show your best fighting skill .

Fighting Club 2018: features

High-Quality music and real fighting sounds.
Smooth fighter animations & amazing 3d fighting styles.
Amazing fighting Environment.
Smooth and easy controls.
